Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: talking books, journals and magazines, childrens story sacks, exhibition space in foyer community meeting room for hire, A3 and A4 photocopier, fax service, books and CDs (including a Black collection), DVDs, newspapers, community language materials in Arabic, Somali and Urdu. Activities include a weekly coffee morning, homework club and Baby Time. Also provides free green garden waste bags. Provides 5 People's Network computers plus 3 laptops with Microsoft Office and Internet access available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-6.30pm, Tues & Thurs closed, Wed & Fri 9.30am-12.30pm, 1.30-5.30pm, Sat 9.30am-3pm (opening times); Mon 4-5pm (Homework Zone), Wed 10-11.30am (coffee morning), alternate Sat 11am-12noon (Councillors Surgery), 2nd & 4th Monday in the month 10-11.30am (Baby Time)
